title: a) High rise building having height more than 70 m
clause_text: a) High rise building having height more than 70 m. shall necessarily be provided with fire escape chute shaft/s for every wing adjacent to staircase. Walls of the shaft shall have 4 hours' fire resistance. One side of the shaft shall be at external face of the building with proper ventilation.
section: Fire Escape Chutes / controlled Lowering Device for evacuation

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
